contact.professional_summary: Computer Science undergraduate student passionate about automating manual tasks with substantial hands-on experience in Amazon Web Services. A self-motivated learner who can apply previous experience and novel, creative solutions to solve problems.

work_experience.title: Vendor Management Assistant Team Lead

projects.name: Package Delivery Algorithm
description: Designed a nearest-neighbor algorithm with a custom hash table that delivers packages to various addresses before a deadline, within delivery truck mileage constraints, and individual package requirements.
